basics.name: Binesh Kumar Sadanandan
basics.label: Ph.D. Candidate & Research Engineer
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate at SAIL Lab, University of New Haven, with extensive experience in data science and healthcare technology. Specializing in AI applications for healthcare, particularly precision oncology.

work.name: Medtronic
work.position: Senior Principal Research and Development Engineer & Technical Fellow
work.summary: Focusing on data analytics, machine learning, and cloud technologies to enhance healthcare solutions in minimally invasive therapies and precision oncology.

work.name: University of New Haven - SAIL Lab
work.summary: Research in AI applications for healthcare, particularly using reinforcement learning for precision oncology.
highlights: Advanced methodologies for personalized cancer treatment

projects.name: Precision Oncology Research
projects.summary: Developing methodologies for personalized cancer treatment using AI and machine learning.
